verses.kjv: And I saw another sign in heaven, great and marvellous, seven angels having the seven last plagues; for in them is filled up the wrath of God.
verses.web: I saw another great and marvelous sign in the sky: seven angels having the seven last plagues, for in them God’s wrath is finished.
verses.ct: Then I saw another sign in heaven — an awesome and terrifying sight: 7 angels carrying the 7 final plagues. These would be the last, because with them God's wrath would be complete.

verses.kjv: And I saw as it were a sea of glass mingled with fire: and them that had gotten the victory over the beast, and over his image, and over his mark, and over the number of his name, stand on the sea of glass, having the harps of God.
verses.web: I saw something like a sea of glass mixed with fire, and those who overcame the beast, his image, and the number of his name, standing on the sea of glass, having harps of God.
verses.ct: I saw what looked like a sea of glass mixed with fire. Standing on it were the people who had conquered the beast, refused his image, and rejected the number of his name. Each of them held a harp given by God.

verses.kjv: And they sing the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, Great and marvellous are thy works, Lord God Almighty; just and true are thy ways, thou King of saints.
verses.web: They sang the song of Moses, the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, “Great and marvelous are your works, Lord God, the Almighty! Righteous and true are your ways, you King of the nations.
verses.ct: They sang the song of Moses, the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb: "Great and marvelous are your works, Lord God, the Almighty! Your ways are righteous and true, O King of saints.

verses.kjv: Who shall not fear thee, O Lord, and glorify thy name? for thou only art holy: for all nations shall come and worship before thee; for thy judgments are made manifest.
verses.web: Who wouldn’t fear you, Lord, and glorify your name? For you only are holy. For all the nations will come and worship before you. For your righteous acts have been revealed.”
verses.ct: Who would not fear you, Lord, and glorify your name? You alone are holy. Every nation will come and worship before you, because your righteous judgments have been revealed for all to see."

verses.kjv: And after that I looked, and, behold, the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened:
verses.web: After these things I looked, and the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened.
verses.ct: After this I looked, and the temple in heaven — the tabernacle of the testimony — was thrown open.

verses.kjv: And the seven angels came out of the temple, having the seven plagues, clothed in pure and white linen, and having their breasts girded with golden girdles.
verses.web: The seven angels who had the seven plagues came out, clothed with pure, bright linen, and wearing golden sashes around their breasts.
verses.ct: Out of the temple came the 7 angels carrying the 7 plagues. They were dressed in pure, brilliant linen with golden sashes across their chests.

verses.kjv: And one of the four beasts gave unto the seven angels seven golden vials full of the wrath of God, who liveth for ever and ever.
verses.web: One of the four living creatures gave to the seven angels seven golden bowls full of the wrath of God, who lives forever and ever.
verses.ct: Then one of the 4 living creatures handed each of the 7 angels a golden bowl filled with the wrath of God, who lives forever and ever.

verses.kjv: And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power; and no man was able to enter into the temple, till the seven plagues of the seven angels were fulfilled.
verses.web: The temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power. No one was able to enter into the temple until the seven plagues of the seven angels would be finished.
verses.ct: The temple filled with smoke from the glory and power of God, and no one could enter it until the 7 plagues carried by the 7 angels had run their course.
